title: A Fa Bei Leyuan Zhi Qi Jing Zhi Lu
title_japanese: 阿法贝乐园之奇境之旅
synopsis: Driven by curiosity, Qiqi and his friends go on adventures in various wonderlands. In the kingdom of time, Qiqi and the others learned the principle of cherishing time, and they also learned the rich expressions of time in English; at the snowman yoyo's house, Qiqi not only spent a special Christmas there, but also solved transitive verbs. There are two grammatical difficulties with intransitive verbs; the magic grapes in the western town, the bigeye fish in the underwater world, and the big-nosed uncle looking for memories...what surprises will they bring to Kiki? (translated from youku)

Prequel.name: A Fa Bei Leyuan Zhi Mofa Xiaoxuesheng
